link.title: Garvey School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: Garvey School District serves K-8th grade students and is located in Rosemead, CA.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Garvey School District, Dual Language Immersion Program, Computer Science, Robotics, Coding, 21st Century Learning, Leader in Me Program, Leadership, STEM,

img.alt: Garvey School District: School Closures Thumbnail Image

div.div: Learn more about school closure, services, distance learning, and more. Thank you for your continuous support and partnership during this challenging time.

img.alt: 2020-21 Student Enrollment Thumbnail Image

div.div: Garvey School District welcomes new and continuing students! Enroll your child for the 2020-21 school year beginning on February 18. Learn more.

img.alt: 2018-2019 SARC Thumbnail Image

div.div: To view the 2018-2019 School Accountability Report Card (SARC) for schools within the Garvey School District, please click here.

img.alt: 2020-21 Dual Language+ Program Thumbnail Image

div.div: Apply for the Dual Language+ Program (Chinese/English or Spanish/English)! The application deadline is February 28, 2020. Schools offered: Dewey, Duff and Hillcrest. Learn more.

img.alt: Don't forget to apply for school lunch - It's not too late Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Don't forget to apply for school lunch - It's not too late

div.div: **PARENTS** Please complete Your Child(ren)'s Application for Free or Reduced Meals! Create an account at www.schoolcafe.com If you need assistance please call (626) 307-3407
